title: Art Nouveau type examples
content:
Any idea of type used during Art Nouveau, or inspired on in? Or examples of type designed after that and inspired in art nouveau?

thank you
author: catarina dantas

comments.content:
More info here:

[http://www.graphic-design.com/DTG/Design/nouveau/nouveau.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416154525/http:/www.graphic-design.com/DTG/Design/nouveau/nouveau.html)  
 [http://www.fonts.com/AboutFonts/Articles/fyti/ArtNouveauTypestyles.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416154525/http:/www.fonts.com/AboutFonts/Articles/fyti/ArtNouveauTypestyles.htm)

and these books maybe have more info:

[http://www.amazon.com/Treasury-Authentic-Art-Nouveau-Decorative/dp/0486246531](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416154525/http:/www.amazon.com/Treasury-Authentic-Art-Nouveau-Decorative/dp/0486246531)  
 [http://www.amazon.com/Art-Nouveau-Display-Alphabets-Pictorial/dp/0486233863/ref=pd\_sim\_b\_1](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416154525/http:/www.amazon.com/Art-Nouveau-Display-Alphabets-Pictorial/dp/0486233863/ref=pd_sim_b_1)

Espero ter ajudado.  
António
Look in the Dan Solo electronic fonts under Art Nouveau.
